Tests that multiple HTTP headers with same name are correctly folded into one LF-separated line.
Link header of fetch of http://localhost:8000/inspector-protocol/network/resources/multiple-headers.php?fetch=1: <http://www.example.com/downloads/white-paper.pdf>; rel="canonical"
<http://example.com>;rel="alternate";hreflang="xx"
Link header of navigation to http://localhost:8000/inspector-protocol/network/resources/multiple-headers.php: <http://www.example.com/downloads/white-paper.pdf>; rel="canonical"
<http://example.com>;rel="alternate";hreflang="xx"
